freenet.support
Class URLDecoder

java.lang.Object
  freenet.support.URLDecoder

public class URLDecoder
extends Object

Decode encoded URLs (or parts of URLs). @see URLEncoder. This class does NOT decode application/x-www-form-urlencoded strings, unlike @see java.net.URLDecoder. What it does is decode bits of URIs, in UTF-8. This simply means that it converts encoded characters (assuming a charset of UTF-8). java.net.URI does similar things internally.

Author:
Theodore Hong Originally!

decode

public static String decode(String s,
                            boolean tolerant)
                     throws URLEncodedFormatException
Decodes a URLEncoder format string.

Parameters:
s - String to be translated.
tolerant - If true, be tolerant of bogus escapes; bogus escapes are treated as just plain characters. Not recommended; a hack to allow users to paste in URLs containing %'s.
Returns:
the translated String.
Throws:
URLEncodedFormatException
